title: Crash and no reconnect ability
body: My game crashed despite having no internet problems. When I went back into the client I had no ability to reconnect and I can even que into another game despite that game being still ongoing. I know a few other people with this problem as well. Also I really hope I don't get banned from this.

replies.body: If you weren't able to reconnect to that game, there's a pretty good chance that it crashed entirely from the server and everyone else was booted from it as well. No worries, you won't get any penalties if the game crashed and you're free to queue back up!

I had this problem too and I received a leaver busters for 20 minutes for 5 games, I have sent a bug ticket to riot and asked them to remove the ban because of the bug. I'll get the link to the ticket and add it to this comment, Good Luck!
